title: ［做爛市大學］城大資助雇主聘請城大畢業生3個月薪酬

replies.msg:
【致：準城大畢業生💌】

疫情令全球經濟及就業放緩，大學畢業生搵工難上加難。好消息係：城大推出「城」就開拓計劃 (CARLS)，撥備了千萬元為準畢業生開拓工作機會，包括每名畢業生配對一個僱主，津貼三個月薪酬的三份之一或上限為每月6,000港元的配對基金，以增加城大畢業生的搵工優勢；每月仲會舉辦多場網上講座，教你各種求職技巧、寫好CV，甚至提供情緒支援，由內至外為準畢業生做好就業準備，一起開拓未來！立即了解更多 https://bit.ly/3i5fgJl

#好消息 #城就開拓計劃 #手動傳 #記住傳俾HR #CityUer #搵工優勢 #城大

【To CityU’s 2020 fresh graduates 💌】

The pandemic has set back the global economy, causing a downturn in employment. It has made it much harder for fresh graduates to find jobs. The GOOD news is – CityU has launched a new initiative named “CAReer Launch Scheme (#CARLS)”. A fund worth HK$10 million will provide employability support for our fresh graduates and employers. To create more work exposure opportunities, it includes matching funds for employers at one third of his/her monthly salary, capped at HK$6,000 per CityU graduate per month, for up to 3 months. Different workshops and career talks are also being held online to help our students develop useful job search strategies and even for emotional support. Let’s get ready for opening up the future! Learn more: https://bit.ly/3i5fgJl

#CityU #employment #employability #goodnews #graduation #graduation2020 #freshgraduates #careeropportunity #winwin
